name: fda-drugs-mcp
description: MCP server for accessing FDA drug data through OpenFDA API
long_description: A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to access FDA drug data through the OpenFDA API. Features include searching drugs by name and indication, retrieving detailed drug information, finding similar drugs, and accessing application history. Focuses on BLA/NDA approved drugs by default.

tools.name: search_drug_by_name
tools.description: Search for drugs by brand or generic name

tools.name: search_drug_by_indication
tools.description: Search for drugs by medical indication or condition

tools.name: get_drug_details
tools.description: Get comprehensive details for a specific drug using its set ID

tools.name: search_similar_drugs
tools.description: Find drugs similar to a reference drug based on mechanism of action or indication

tools.name: get_drug_application_history
tools.description: Get application history and approval details for a drug application
